概述   软件包  类  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个软件包   下一个软件包 框架    无框架    

软件包 com.easemob

接口摘要
EMCallBack The general callback interface The errors defined in this callback is moved to EMError, so please stop using those errors.
EMConnectionListener Define the connection listener We only support 2 states : connected, disconnected And please be careful: APP should not update UI in this api since this is called from worker thread or heavy work which will block other listener to handle this connection event And Please see EMError for detailed error description on disconnected
 

类摘要
EMError The error list
 

概述   软件包  类  树  已过时  索引  帮助
